data.name: The Chrono Jotter Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Check it and let me know if you like my version: The Chrono Jotter is a mystery visual novel where you play as Ran Ibuki, a high-school student who finds herself trapped in a chilling game of death and life as she fights to bring her lost girlfriend back. Now, you'll be able to reminisce this thrilling adventure event out of home thanks to its official soundtrack composed by 贤狼HUSKY!

Enjoy a compilation of 11 musical themes inspired by the chilling adventures of Ran Ibuki as she investigates the mystery behind an abandoned school where students were slaughtered long ago -- and tries to save the girl she loves. Dive into the universe of The Chrono Jotter by listening to both soft melodies and tense compositions that will remind you of the best moments in the game.

This content will be available on September 16th as a free DLC for all players.
